theme/shadoweffects_info_label: Adds Shadow Effect to some cards and widgets, not visible on dark mode!
connections/discordid_info_label: To get the Server ID, go to Discord Server > Server Settings > Widget > Server ID > Copy. {{moreinfoLinkStart}}Read more Â»{{moreinfoLinkEnd}}.
connections/discordview_info_label: This in navbar on the left. To get it to work, you have to enable Server Widget in Discord Server > Server Settings > Widget. Don't forget to make an Invite Channel.
navbar/navbarlogo_info_label: This is a logo in the middle of navbar.
navbar/navbarbanner_info_label: This is a banner image appeared behind of logo.
navbar/navbarexclude_info_label: Exclude specified links seperated with {{slashCodeStart}}/{{slashCodeEnd}} from the navigation bar.
navbar/navbarstyle_info_label: Sets style of content below the sticky navbar.
navbar/navbartype_info_label: Select a type of navbar that appears at top.
card/custom_content_not_set: Warning! Custom Content not set in Configuration > General Settings
card/cardcontent_info: These settings require Custom Content to be enabled at Configuration > General Settings.
portal/portal_not_set: Warning! Portal not set in Configuration > General Settings
portal/portal_info: These settings require Portal to be enabled at Configuration > General Settings.
options/customcss_info_label: Here you can paste your CSS.
options/customjs_info_label: Here you can paste your JS.
welcome/welcomesection_info_label: This appears below the navbar when a user is guest/not logged in
home/review_info: This template is still in beta, there may be bugs and missing functions. Keep an eye on updates {{riLinkStart}}here{{riLinkEnd}}.
module/send_feedback: Send a feedback to your favourite resource!
